Articles.Content:
I tried to make a F-22 Raptor in KSP with C-7 aviation pack, and other packs from the links on C-7\'s post.

This is the F-22.

http://img207.imageshack.us/img207/2930/screenshot0hs.png

It has a UAV that launches on the bottom and 6 missiles.

http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/3916/screenshot1wo.png

These are the missiles firing off and some pics of the landing gear.

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/screenshot2ck.png/

This is a forward shot of the Raptor.

http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/9564/screenshot4jt.png

Please tell me what I could do to improve it or what you think about it. Thanks!
the spacecraft exchange is like, 2 forums below general discussion.

(not relevant, but just to help you out, you can highlight the direct links in your post and then click the picture of mona lisa. This will make it instantly able to be viewed right on the post, instead of clicking a link)
